Question & Options:
What relationships exist between Arthur and Murray in the context of the movie 'Joker'?
Options:
A. A) Arthur was an employee of Murray.
B. B) Murray was an employee of Arthur.
C. C) Arthur confessed to murders on Murray's show.
D. D) Arthur killed Murray during the broadcast.
Correct Answer: A) Arthur was an employee of Murray., C) Arthur confessed to murders on Murray's show., D) Arthur killed Murray during the broadcast.

Question & Options:
What are the significant events and relationships involving Arthur, Murray, and the rioters in the film 'Joker'?
Options:
A. A) Arthur confesses to the subway murders on Murray's show.
B. B) Murray is Arthur's employer.
C. C) Rioters erupt across the city after Arthur's escape from police custody.
D. D) Rioters spare Bruce Wayne during the chaos.
Correct Answer: A) Arthur confesses to the subway murders on Murray's show., B) Murray is Arthur's employer., C) Rioters erupt across the city after Arthur's escape from police custody., D) Rioters spare Bruce Wayne during the chaos.
